first_para: Emily Anne Thornberry (born 27 July 1960) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Islington South and Finsbury since 2005.

full.extract:
Emily Anne Thornberry (born 27 July 1960) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Islington South and Finsbury since 2005.
Thornberry served as Shadow Attorney General from 2011 until her resignation on 20 November 2014.
Her marriage to The Hon Mr Justice Nugee makes her formally styled Lady Nugee MP, but she does not use the title.
^ "Labour's Emily Thornberry quits over 'snobby' tweet". BBC News. Retrieved 22 November 2014. 
^ Fisher, Lucy (22 November 2014). "Rich lawyer from council house". Times Newspapers Limited. Retrieved 24 March 2015.
full.title: Emily Thornberry
